summary: This document contains financial statements from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for Gratitude America, Ltd. It outlines deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments for the account during March 2016. The document is significant as it provides insight into the financial activities related to the Epstein case.
locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document details account balances for Gratitude America, Ltd. as of March 31, 2016.
The account had a beginning balance of $73,374.13 and an ending balance of $238,501.16.
Significant transactions include a cash transfer of $230,000.00 on March 8, 2016.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF return item fees during the statement period.
Interest earned during the period was $18.53.
